verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Make <S%H6213><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> trumpets <S%H2689><s%> of silver. <S%H3701><s%> You shall make <S%H6213><s%> them of beaten work. <S%H4749><s%> You shall use <S%H1961><s%> them for the calling <S%H4744><s%> of the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> and for the journeying <S%H4550><s%> of the camps. <S%H4264><s%>

When they blow <S%H8628><s%> them, <S%H2004><s%> all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> shall gather <S%H3259><s%> themselves to you at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting. <S%H4150><s%>

If they blow <S%H8628><s%> just one, <S%H259><s%> then the princes, <S%H5387><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the thousands <S%H505><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> shall gather themselves to you. <S%H3259><s%>
When you blow <S%H8628><s%> an alarm, <S%H8643><s%> the camps <S%H4264><s%> that lie <S%H2583><s%> on the east side <S%H6924><s%> shall go forward. <S%H5265><s%>

When you blow <S%H8628><s%> an alarm <S%H8643><s%> the second time, <S%H8145><s%> the camps <S%H4264><s%> that lie <S%H2583><s%> on the south side <S%H8486><s%> shall go forward. <S%H5265><s%> They shall blow <S%H8628><s%> an alarm <S%H8643><s%> for their journeys. <S%H5265><s%>
But when the assembly <S%H6951><s%> is to be gathered together, <S%H6950><s%> you shall blow, <S%H8628><s%> but you shall not sound an alarm. <S%H7321><s%>

"The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> the priests, <S%H3548><s%> shall blow <S%H8628><s%> the trumpets. <S%H2689><s%> This shall be to you for a statute <S%H2708><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> throughout your generations. <S%H1755><s%>

When you go <S%H935><s%> to war <S%H4421><s%> in your land <S%H776><s%> against <S%H6862><s%> the adversary who oppresses <S%H6887><s%> you, <S%H7321><s%> then you shall sound an alarm with the trumpets. <S%H2689><s%> Then you will be remembered <S%H2142><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and you will be saved <S%H3467><s%> from your enemies. <S%H341><s%>

"Also in the day <S%H3117><s%> of your gladness, <S%H8057><s%> and in your set feasts, <S%H4150><s%> and in the beginnings <S%H7218><s%> of your months, <S%H2320><s%> you shall blow <S%H8628><s%> the trumpets <S%H2689><s%> over your burnt offerings, <S%H5930><s%> and over the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of your peace offerings; <S%H8002><s%> and they shall be to you for a memorial <S%H2146><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%> I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>"

It happened in the second <S%H8145><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the second <S%H8145><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> on the twentieth <S%H6242><s%> day of the month, <S%H6051><s%> that the cloud was taken up <S%H5927><s%> from over the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the testimony. <S%H5715><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went forward <S%H5265><s%> according to their journeys <S%H4550><s%> out of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai; <S%H5514><s%> and the cloud <S%H6051><s%> stayed <S%H7931><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Paran. <S%H6290><s%>
They first <S%H7223><s%> went forward <S%H5265><s%> according to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

First, <S%H7223><s%> the standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> went <S%H5265><s%> forward according to their armies. <S%H6635><s%> Nahshon <S%H5177><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amminadab was over his army. <S%H5992><s%>
Nethanel <S%H5417><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zuar <S%H6686><s%> was over the army <S%H6635><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar. <S%H3485><s%>
Eliab <S%H446><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Helon <S%H2497><s%> was over the army <S%H6635><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun. <S%H2074><s%>

The tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> was taken down; <S%H3381><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon <S%H1648><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari, <S%H4847><s%> who bore <S%H5375><s%> the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> went forward. <S%H5265><s%>

The standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> went forward <S%H5265><s%> according to their armies. <S%H6635><s%> Elizur <S%H468><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shedeur <S%H7707><s%> was over his army. <S%H6635><s%>
Shelumiel <S%H8017><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zurishaddai <S%H6701><s%> was over the army <S%H6635><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon. <S%H8095><s%>
Eliasaph <S%H460><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Deuel <S%H1845><s%> was over the army <S%H6635><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad. <S%H1410><s%>

The Kohathites <S%H6956><s%> set forward, <S%H5265><s%> bearing <S%H5375><s%> the sanctuary. <S%H4720><s%> The others set up <S%H6965><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> before they arrived. <S%H935><s%>

The standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> set forward <S%H5265><s%> according to their armies. <S%H6635><s%> Elishama <S%H476><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammihud <S%H5989><s%> was over his army. <S%H6635><s%>
Gamaliel <S%H1583><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pedahzur <S%H6301><s%> was over the army <S%H6635><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh. <S%H4519><s%>
Abidan <S%H27><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gideoni <S%H1441><s%> was over the army <S%H6635><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin. <S%H1144><s%>

The standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan, <S%H1835><s%> which was the rear guard <S%H622><s%> of all the camps, <S%H4264><s%> set forward <S%H5265><s%> according to their armies. <S%H6635><s%> Ahiezer <S%H295><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammishaddai <S%H5996><s%> was over his army. <S%H6635><s%>
Pagiel <S%H6295><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ochran <S%H5918><s%> was over the army <S%H6635><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Asher. <S%H836><s%>
Ahira <S%H299><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Enan <S%H5881><s%> was over the army <S%H6635><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali. <S%H5321><s%>
Thus were <S%H428><s%> the travels <S%H4550><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> according to their armies; <S%H6635><s%> and they went forward. <S%H5265><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Hobab, <S%H2246><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Reuel <S%H7467><s%> the Midianite, <S%H4084><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>' father-in <S%H2859><s%>-law, "We are journeying <S%H5265><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> of which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> <S%H5414><s%> 'I will give it to you. <S%H3212><s%>' Come with us, <S%H2895><s%> and we will treat you well; for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> good <S%H2895><s%> concerning Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"
He said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H3212><s%> "I will not go; but I will depart <S%H3212><s%> to my own land, <S%H776><s%> and to my relatives. <S%H4138><s%>"
He said, <S%H559><s%> "Don't <S%H5800><s%> leave us, <S%H3651><s%> please; because you know how we are to encamp <S%H2583><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and you can be our eyes. <S%H5869><s%>
It shall be, <S%H3212><s%> if you go with us, <S%H2896><s%> yes, it shall be, that whatever good Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> does <S%H3190><s%> to us, <S%H3190><s%> we will do the same to you."

They set forward <S%H5265><s%> from the Mount <S%H2022><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>' journey. <S%H1870><s%> The ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> went <S%H5265><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>' journey, <S%H1870><s%> to seek out <S%H8446><s%> a resting place for them. <S%H4496><s%>
The cloud <S%H6051><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was over them by day, <S%H3119><s%> when they set forward <S%H5265><s%> from the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

It happened, <S%H727><s%> when the ark went forward, <S%H5265><s%> that Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Rise up, <S%H6965><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and let your enemies <S%H341><s%> be scattered! <S%H6327><s%> Let those who hate <S%H8130><s%> you flee <S%H5127><s%> before you! <S%H6440><s%>"
When it rested, <S%H5117><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> "Return, <S%H7725><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> to the ten <S%H7233><s%> thousands <S%H505><s%> of the thousands of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"
